title: As Markets Reel, Startups Hope for ‘Flat’ Rounds
sub_head: The froth of past valuations has waned. If a startup manages to get the same per-share price of its previous funding—a flat round—it’s a win. ‘Flat is the new up,’ says one startup CEO
body:
Not long ago entrepreneurs in hot sectors like healthtech watched their valuations leap with each new round of venture funding.
Now, with capital markets tumbling, startups that manage to raise new funding at the same price per share as their last one—a flat round—are calling it a victory.
Take H1, a New York-based platform that connects healthcare...
